amendment.description: Amendment sought to require safety review of permits to take into consideration all applicable safety, environmental and fisheries laws.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in Part A of House Report 112-73 to require safety review of permits to take into consideration all applicable safety, environmental and fisheries laws.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Polis amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 167 - 245 (Roll no. 299).

action.text: Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Polis amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 167 - 245 (Roll no. 299).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Polis.
